description: The `ballerinax/sap.successfactors.ecdismissalprotection` package provides APIs that enable seamless integration with the [SAP SuccessFactors Dismissal Protection API v1.0](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_SUCCESSFACTORS_PLATFORM/d599f15995d348a1b45ba5603e2aba9b/c508d8543026442d88457f3654b4e91d.html). The service allows to manage dismissal protection information for employees, ensuring compliance with labor laws and regulations.
